caption: Delicious
The warehouse is the historic building; We drove right past this because the huge sign on the building said it was a fireproof warehouse!
Excellent food & nice atmosphere & great staff definitely recommend for lunch & dinner any day of the week!!

This place was pretty busy on a Saturday evening. Showed up around 6:30ish. Seated quickly. They have outdoor seating on the sidewalk and also outside in the back of the restaurant. Nicely lit. Romantic Italian music playing in the background. I had a Sangria which in my opinion tasted like juice. Hefty glass but a waste of calories for me. Didn't bother to order another. We had calamari for starters and it was fresh and delicious!! Not greasy. Loved it. It was a lot. So took some home. I ordered the penne bistecca which was delicious!! So tasty. Again a lot of food on the plate. My man had steak and mashed potatoes which was also tasty. It came with salad on the side! So good! Lots of food. We both ended up bringing it home and had it for next day brunch!!! Will definitely return! Loved the ambiance and service.

Good pasta with seafood and cheesecake. Skip the ribs, the meat was hard and stringy; I'm surprised they messed up ribs, really. Nice atmosphere. The service was cordial, but slow and distracted. We ordered the pasta with red sauce, but it came with white sauce.
Atmosphere was nice waiter was nice food was ok had flavor but next 5ime I will order something else.
Luv it
Would definitely recommend trying this spot. Exceptional atmosphere, fresh food, excellent customer service. They never disappoint.
Nice spot...good food...good service...thumbs up...
Drinks and food was good!!
Great ambiance and food!!
I found a hidden gem.
Awesome food and even better atmosphere! Outdoor patio is neat.  Did not have to wait for service.   Even during pumpkin festival.
nice cocktails, good service, definitely got to place for brunch, long wait but worth it
Amazing!! I wish the manager would have came over so I could have told him how attractive everyone was. It's okay ad It's been over 5 years since I've been back to NY but it was worth it.
Great food, good portions and friendly staff. Brunch is a must here!

The food is nice and there is a great amount of spacing but they don't have unlimited mimosas even though they say they do. For 1 hour they bring 1 glass per person at a time rather than let's say giving the table a pitcher. They try to say it's a NY law thing but I worked in a restaurant... it's not. They just want to milk the hour as you'll get about 5 glasses max as you have to wait until they get the glass and bring it back which alone takes them 8-10 mins. Unlimited means if I want 5 glasses at a time I expect 5 glasses at a time. It's best to just get a pitcher for yourself and it's cheaper in the long run on top of being more fulfilling.
The food did take awhile to come more than it usually does, but I had only been for brunch until 2 days ago.... But the food was good.

Service was phenomenal. All of the workers are very kind, attentive and genuine. They replace all of your utensils and plates without asking. Pricing is in the middle, so it depends on what you order. The crab cakes were very good. The ribeye was a bit tough and pricey. I wish it was a little more seasoned or had some chimichurri sauce but the crust on it was pretty tasty. The fettuccini chicken Alfredo was great. The cream wasn’t too heavy, it was just right. Drinks are strong and well priced; try the agave margarita. I definitely want to return and try other things on their menu.

This afternoon I went to Verde Restaurant, the owner was attentive the moment he welcomed me to the restaurant. I ordered Penni a la Vodka, with grilled chicken and baked clams. The dishes were outstanding. I highly recommend this restaurant ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Absolutely LOVED this place. The food was amazing; the drinks were amazing as well. Went on a Sunday for brunch. The music and vibes were exactly what we needed for a break of the winter. Staff was amazing!  Manager Marco and Burak were amazing!!

We had wanted to come here for a few months now, so Valentine's day seemed like  a perfect day to come. Thank you so much , it was great! The food was excellent, and the service was  great and the restaurant was beautiful.

I asked for a medium steak, and it was rare. The food just seemed as if they rushed it, which blew my mind because there was literally no one else at the restaurant. Even the fresh fruit tasted like there was cross contamination... why does my strawberry taste like onions? Idk... just not the best experience.
Pretty friendly !!
First time there, in a pandemic no less. Really nice outdoor set up
so good

Went for dinner and it was delicious! I think the overall ambiance could have been improved (calmer music, dimmer lighting). Outdoor dining was very warm, didnt even have to wear our coats. Plates of pasta were large portions and got to bring some home. Cocktails werent too weak! Impressed with Verde on Smith

🌊 BLUEPOINT OYSTERS from #Connecticut (#happyhour #bar #menu ) At VERDE ON SMITH  ✨ There are many places you can encounter happy hour Oysters for less through the five boroughs. However, very few of those locations will match the extremely high quality fine-dining experience that you receive from the charming staff at #Verde 💁🏽‍♂️💁🏻  I have been dining here for years. Verde has consistently provided excellent customer service and great tasting cuisine. 😋  #AboutLastNight #MyHungryWorld #SkinnyGirlsLuvFood2 #Brooklyn ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️
Amazing !!!
Actually has warm outdoor indoor dinning
Great times with family and friends
I love this place!
Food was amazing!! Service was amazing! Outdoor dining could have been a bit more cozy but they tried their best to accommodate.
Get the Nutella French Toast and Steak & Eggs!
The food was great and delicious. You get the option of dining in a pod, half open area with a heater or semi indoor space with heaters. Waiters are attentive also.
Great food and a lovely atmosphere
Beautiful outside area for brunch! Food is delicious and they did a great job dealing with Covid rules.
Great service. However I would say their brunch menu is not that great but their lunch and dinner are amazing. Get the shrimp Alfredo !! so good 😊

(Translated by Google) We arrived wet, hungry and cold. They took great care of us since we arrived, delicious food, very attentive hot place and beautiful place. If I go back to New York I would definitely come back  (Original) Llegamos mojados con hambre y frio. Nos atendieron super bien desde que llegamos, comida rica, lugar caliente muy atentos y hermoso lugar. Si regreso a New York definitivamente volvería

Went for Sunday brunch and had a splendid time! Our group if 4 was seated in the back courtyard dining and it was beautiful. Unlimited drinks for a set time frame and price was definitely worth it!! Food was warm and delicious. We'll be coming back 🙏
Great place with heated outdoor dining.
Great food and cozy seating area
So good and outside dining was lovely even in 30 degree weather thanks to the heating lamps
Amazing food excellent service
The wife and I love this place! Great service, friendly staff, food presentation is immaculate and the brunch mimosas get us just drunk enough for some afternoon delight!!!

My favorite brunch spot hands down! I have been coming here for a little over a year now. The food and drinks are equally as amazing. They have a great bottomless brunch ($17 for 1 hour). The environment is ideal and compliant with social distancing and all of the CDC’s COVID guidelines. The atmosphere is warm and welcoming and the music is always a nice blend. My go to meal is their Viva Nutella Crepe (delicious!) with a side of eggs and smoked salmon (yum!). When I’m feeling bold I get the Greek Omelette (no olives with smoked salmon & tomatoes 😋). My boyfriend switches between the French toast and pancakes (he still doesn’t know which one he likes more lol). This spot is great for a date and also for groups; I came here for my twin nieces 12th birthday with at least 8-10 people and we were accommodated well. Keep in mind the wait on any Saturday can be anywhere from 30 mins to an hour but it’s always worth it. Their brunch is also available during weekdays. The entire staff and overall hospitality of Verde’s is one of the reasons it is one of my favorite restaurants. They have a garden in the back with a ceiling that opens up and heaters to keep warm as well as outdoor seating in the front.

Excellent customer service on a Saturday.l for brunch.   Went with a party of 8, staff very attentive. We had about four or five drink in the hour for happy hour. I came back a few days later for my COVID birthday dinner. Had a great time then as well.
Chill vibes, great food and drinks.

I went today to celebrate a sweet friend's birthday. We indulged in the bottomless mimosa brunch menu. Before our drinks were completely finished, our server Yetish was right there with the next round! Round after round after round! In addition, food was hot in temperature, seasoned to perfection, and absolutely delicious! There were zero complaints in our party! We will DEFINITELY be going again!

I went to brunch with my girlfriends here a few weeks ago. The vibe in this restaurant is super cute. Especially if you get the heated outdoor seating. There was quite a long wait but that’s because they don’t do reservations. Once we were seated, the service was really good. One thing I hate about bottomless brunch service is how long they sometimes take to bring out the drinks. That was not the case here at all. Before I could even finish one mimosa, the next one was out. The food was really good and came out in a reasonable amount of time. By the time our brunch was over, we were all drunk out of our minds. We got lost in the restaurant and ended up in the kitchen with these super funny chefs. Overall it was an amazing experience. I will definitely be returning.

Amazing food at an amazing price very affordable! The staff is amazing everyone is kind and courteous! Abi is absolutely amazing! If you're downtown Brooklyn verde is a must! Authentic Italian food at an affordable price!
It was very pleasant , the food is good. And they very nice , nice people !

NOT A FAN. The service was lacking to say the least. The food was not worth the price point. Everything was bland and took forever to come out. The Bloody Mary was one of the worst I've had in my life. The champagne for their 90 minute brunch is extremely cheap and will give you a headache. The outdoor seating options with heat is nice but, they have people packed in and it didn't feel safe. I highly doubt I'll be back.
The kobe burger was delicious.
Excellent service. Food was delicious.

If I could give this place 10 stars I would. The brunch is perfect. The bottomless mimosas for 60 mins ( that you can change at anytime to a Screwdriver, Bellini or a Bloody Mary ) gets the job done. The food is amazing & the staff is extremely friendly and attentive. Our server checked in on us often but was not over bearing. The outdoor seating is AMAZING you don’t even realize you are out door, it’s covered and heated. The indoor set up is just as nice. Overall Verde is the best place to go to for Brunch! Thank me later !!
Absolutely gorgeous,
I can't get enough of this place. I love the drinks and food. Reasonable pricing. Me and hubby are there atleast once a week
Nice place,  great food highly recommended
Crab cakes love love love
Great bunch and great cocktails. I highly recommend the place.
Verde on Smith is very popular and for good reason. Their brunch is awesome and the bottomless mimosas kept on coming.
The waiter was friendly and attentive. The eggs are great and the potato wedges. I got bottomless mimosas and was able to finish 4 for the hour they gave me
Gave a 4 out 5 stars because of the wait time for a table but otherwise the food was really good and the service was amazing.
best brunch ever!!!!!!!!!
Was very disappointed, had been wanting to check this place out. Food was terrible and service was mediocre. First and last time I wouldn't recommend
Beautiful!!! Elegant food. It was amazing

It was my first time visit  as I have been curious to check it out since everytime I passed by, the food seemed delicious. I was very impressed by the service, everyone was extremely friendly, I enjoyed my brunch which was absolutely amazing and I couldn't help but to oder tiramisu for  desert afterwars. I highly recommend checking this place for brunch if you are looking for reasonable price and great service. I look forward to coming back.
Amazing hospitality, great ambiance and exceptionally tasty food! 👍👍👍 If you're in Brooklyn, then make it a point to dine at Verde on Smith.

Complete joke, it took 45min to cook a salmon... and he even microwaved it. The service was also a joke as if I’ve not tell the waitress where is my salmon!? She wouldn’t even bother to ask!!! Very disappointing... and i hate to say this but i hate writing reviews as i never do it, cause im a bartender myself and i know how it is and feel about it.  And especially during these difficult times. But you guys need to step up, thank god i ordered only one meal course... and to top this off i got late for work because of your unprofessional service and quality. Cheers
The food was ok, the staff was friendly. They put a service charge at the end of the bill that was 39.99 and said that wasn't tip. So on top of the service fee we had to pay $43 extra for tip.
Very nice patio seating, good eats, and a nice atmosphere
The food was overcooked and burned.

Ambiance was fabulous and the food and bevs were top notch!  I had a Kentucky Mule which was delicious and strong!  I also had the seafood pasta in white sauce...the seafood was succulent and amazing!  Great staff.  I'll be back to try other dishes and drinks SOON!
Great food and service

Went Here for Brunch on a Sunday its definitely a popular spot. The food was awesome Drinks where good, service was nice but the seating is a bit tight especially during these times. Other then that its a great place.

The brunch is great and really affordable. The crowd is lively and the option to get a side of French toast or pancakes is great for those of you who often get caught between the option. The french toast however is more like regular toast then ACTUAL french toast though. Still, I would recommend
Staff is friendly very attentive drinks are really good many choices. Brunch menu is large for different pallets. For first time I will say I enjoyed very much.
I love this place for the unlimited drinks for an hour, but the waiters take awhile when bringing the drinks so factor that in when your hour starts.
Great service fresh food and reasonable portions. What else can you ask for?
Very nice cozy place ,I really enjoy myself and a food is almost excellent and don't forget their are very good

The workers are great. One of the workers helped me and my friend get her car key out of the sewer at the corner. So I brought food as a thank you and I have to say I the food was delicious. My daughter enjoyed it as well. I have been in the past for brunch.

They are NOT practicing social distancing!! On the back patio they are seating people at every table. After a 40 minute wait and driving in from LI i allowed them to seat us so close but I felt very uncomfortable. The food was good. The staff was nice. Mimosas were good...but that close seating...i will not be returning!!
I ordered the veggie omelette with a side of turkey sausage. Everything was so flavorful! Service was pretty good and the employees were friendly. I’d recommend and definitely visit again!
Excellent bottomless brunch. The staff was attentive and the outdoor dining in the back was a beautiful scene.
great food, great service, enjoyed sitting outdoors with my love and delicious food
Not bad, average. Wouldn't let you customize didn't care if you were spending money, didn't want to ruffle  the system they had in place, food was good, service OK

Terrible. The guy taking names with the clipboard outside will tell you it’s a half an hour wait. He tells everyone it’s a half an hour. Then you’ll wait well over an hour. When you get in you’ll be rushed. We got our food before we got our coffee. Before coming here, ask yourself if you want to pay $14 for an eggs Benedict that looks like this. Cold, on a raw muffin with thinner than paper bacon. Just an awful experience.
I’m not from NY but I took a trip there and man, first off- Bottomless Mimosas Brunch during the week is already hard to find. Then the service was amazing. By far the best Brunch spot I’ve been to

We ordered hanger steak madeira and red snapper picatta and it was not good at all . It lacked flavor and didn’t feel fresh. Fish with mashed potatoes and spinach felt like it was just warmed up and not cooked right before serving, which should be the case with the price we payed. It felt like buffet food not restaurant food. Very disappointed.
Love it want to go back
Best Italian spot I know of in Brooklyn

I meet with friends this great spot often! This is the best place to dine.  I go to this spot at least once a month. The cooking is excellent, the crew is friendly and the price is decent. I enjoy going in this place over a nice supper.
Better brunch than dinner spot

When we went to pay the lady at the register couldn't ring up our meals separately and instead just split it evenly even though we all got different dishes and some of us got drinks and some of us didn't. The lady said it was just too busy for her to ring up our meals separately.

We went here for a family brunch, overall the food and the service was great. The kids really loved their French toast. And I really liked how much space there was between each customer especially during Covid. The food and everything came out quickly. I would definitely go back. I would just love some more vegetarian and vegan options on the menu.
Great food and ambience
I visited this place on my getaway from ATL. The screwdriver mimosa is nothing to play with!! Customer service is amazing! I will never forget this place 💙
Great service, even better food.

Came here for brunch. Brunch menu is pretty good - no complaints there whatsoever.  However, our service is what knocked that one star.  Our waiter didn't even bother coming back to offer us refill on drinks. Not once did he come to our table to ask whether the food was good or if we needed anything else for that matter. I definitely recommend Hanger Steak Madeira
My server was respectful and went above and beyond to create an off menu dish for me that I requested.

(Translated by Google) Very nice atmosphere, nice place, professional attention and very delicious food just with the curiosity to know if after a consumption of $ 200 or 100 the last glass of wine goes by the house ... thank you: :)  (Original) Muy bonito ambiente , lindo lugar, la atención profesional y  comida muy deliciosa sólo con la curiosidad de saber si después de un consumo de $200 ó 100 la última copa de vino va por la casa..gracias ::)

If they say first impressions are everything then this restaurant really lives up to the saying. I just had my first experience at this restaurant and it was amazing. I love how attentive my waiter was he was great. I also appreciate how the drinks werent to strong, however they were perfect for a social outing. Food was great drinks were great and the service was perfect. I would most definitely recommend this place ☺️!!!
Food is gross. Burger is grey with no sear on it, no seasoning. Greens tasted like they were never washed. Truly subpar plate of slop.

I went during the summer, the wait time was over an hour regardless of our big party reservations. However once, we sat down the food and drinks didn't disappoint. The servers were very nice and accommodating. They was able to attend to everyone despite how packed it was, would go back.
Food was really good, decent sitting place, it wasn't top notch, juice was waaayy to sweet, and the place was alright also.

My girlfriend and I were expecting to have a nice lunch at this restaurant we were recommended however we were given water and after 20min of waiting we ended up just leaving because we were not given any service or shown any attention at all extremely unprofessional.
Great drinks,friendly service and yummmyyy food!
Really nice restaurant.
The forks are dirty the food is bad so i gove it 1 star
A+++++ fod, staff, atmosphere.
The portion size is well worth the price which isn’t that expensive to begin with. I’d definitely recommend brunch with bottomless mimosas. Staff is very attentive as well

Amazing service, servers always checking up on you and making sure your experience is the greatest. The food was good as expected but did not exceed expectations. Atmosphere in this restaurant is perfect for that date night feeling that you want with your SO. Drinks are served strong in my opinion and are gladly welcomed. I highly recommend this restaurant and recommend you tip nicely. These servers deserve it.
Love their Steak Caesar Salad!
Good service and good food
Incredible food and customer service! Thankful they are taking excellent precautions for COVID. I’ll be back!
food and drink was great great service also will definetly come back
Always great service, great outdoor area
Great brunch service
The food was great. The service was great. It was crowded and there was a wait but it was worth it. I will be going back.
Great customer service. Relaxing restaurant well diverse is a plus. Food is okay n drinks are good. Definitely recommended
Bottomless mimosas were awesome
Average overpriced food. Service was decent.

Our family had a great meal here Saturday night. Wonderful food, service, atmosphere & price. Pasta, seafood, salad, wine, coffee - all delicious ! Cooked to perfection. I can’t say enough about this restaurant !
I will be there soon again...
Food was good service was excellent
Great avocado toast and a really nice atmosphere!
Went for brunch... bottomless mimosas are great but food was mehh
Went to brunch and everything was marvelous.  The bottomless drinks and the decor was great. Will definitely be back again.
absolutely love this location,   Besides the fresh delicious dishes , Which very good portions, Excellent customer service.  It's  Located in a   Great neighborhood with transportation  Nearby
The food and service where amazing, however; this time around I found it somewhat noisy and  not as quaint as before.
I went to Verde around 5pm for an early dinner. I must say that the drinks, food and service was excellent.
Very nice place! We got there accidentally , but the Valentine’s Day dinner was wonderful! Recommended!
Valentine's Day Dinner

First: the wait staff was great. Attentive, quick, responsive. That said, the food was mediocre. I had the Canadian Benedict, and my eggs were watery and the potatoes overcooked to the point of being inedible.  The biggest problem was management. We were a large party with a reservation at 1pm. At 12:45, when we were all already there or on our way, they called to say our reservation would be pushed back to 1:30. Okay, fine. Not a lot of warning, but okay. However, there's nowhere to wait inside with a large group, so we stood outside in the cold - for an hour, not the half hour we were told. We were finally seated at 2pm.  Again: wait staff is great. Everything else: pretty freaking terrible.

Bottomless mimosas were great, cheers! However, the food wasn’t spectacular at all and it took WAY too long to arrive. Waited about 45 minutes for the food to come out and it was basically cold and the presentation wasn’t that great. I ordered a chicken with cheese crepe and the crepe was definitely NOT fresh. It was nasty. The only good thing was the mimosas which also were 80% orange juice and 20% champagne, and the deserts.

2nd time here. Both time we had to wait even though we had reservations. We didn't have to wait too long though.  Our table was ready in less than 10 minutes. Once we were seated, the unlimited drinks steadily came. The food was delicious.  We had the eggs any style, french toast, crepes and tuna nicose salad.  Everything was good. Service was excellent.
Delicious! We got the unlimited mimosa/champagne/sangria option along with our brunches.
Verde on Smith has a solid good brunch! Great food and cocktails at a good price point. Nice staff as well! I was allowed to enjoy myself without feeling rushed out by staff. Appreciate that!
Food was delicious!! Fresh, seasoned well, and TASTY!! We will definitely be going back.
Amazing food and service!!

What a great place they truly accommodated a last minute reservation in the patio with a wheelchair. Although they were pretty busy on a very Sunny Saturday  they made sure the drinks were Refilled often. The menu is so extensive in comparison to other brunch places something will definitely catch your eye. Thank you for a great Saturday brunch

Overall a 3.5 star rating in my and my girlfriend's opinion for brunch. This place had a great atmosphere with friendly staff and fair prices. One of few places where you can reserve a table for brunch. We have been to many brunch places throughout the city and have ordered countless omelettes.  Here we each ordered an omelette. My girlfriend gave specific instructions for her order which were not followed through and my omelette was supposed to have tomatoes which were lacking. The taste of the omelettes were just alright. The omelettes came with green salad and potatoes. The salad was very plain, not even a vinaigrette on it, and the potatoes were wedges which actually came burnt. We didn't take advantage of the bottomless mimosa deal which could've bumped up our rating.

We had date night at Verde on Smith and we were pleasantly surprised by this establishment.  Here is why:  Excellent dishes, the Gnocchi was excellent, very well done. I had the pork chops in a Mediterranean sauce made with mushrooms, tomatoes and onions.  It was flavorful and delicious. What would have made the dish perfect if some polenta was paired with the dish.  I had the backed clams as a starter and I must say they were done to perfection, I have never “sucked” on a clam shell as I did whilst enjoy those!  Excellent, Excellent, I cannot day enough about those clams.  My only gripe would be the Sangria, it would have been a bit stronger, my date and I finished the cafe none the less, but the fruits & berries were fresh and added a bright flavor to the sangria.  Customer service was fantastic, they were attentive, engaging and did not over crowd you or pressure you to order.  I love that and we will return for another date night sometime soon and my be try their Brunch,  which I understand happens every day.  Great Job Verde on Smith, you’re going places.
Great brunch spot, backyard, wonderful staff and a great menu, brunch included interesting frittatas, crepes, avocado toasts, and omelettes.
Great food. Amazing staff! Brunch or Dinner, you can't go wrong.
Great place and good food

This is an upscale restaurant. The food is great, the staff is very pleasant and the atmosphere is nice. It is not cheap! But you will get what you pay for. In an area such a Cobble Hill/Boerum Hill with so many nice restaurants, this one stands out!
I will definitely go back food is above and beyond what I expected.
Cozy and quiet Italian restaurant with very attentive service and delicious food. Our party of 4 visited on a busy Monday evening yet food was served quickly and by multiple wait staff.
First time customer, my family and I left very happy. Great service, amazing food and drinks! Definitely recommend and will be back. Food, presentation, and pricing were great.
Nice place nice atmosphere good table service excellent Waiters nice food nice Italian food I recommended for you and your girlfriend are you and your boyfriend or you in a mixed couple I recommended
Nice place for brunch, outside is cute.
Recently had a company party at Verde staff was great food was excellent

I loved the chicken sandwich, the fries were so delicious. My husband's meal was not so good. Their portions are decent and the service was definitely nice. The waiters were seemingly attentive to the order and offered clarifications very nicely. The ambiance of the place is also proper nice. Bright yet warm enough somehow. Their brunch deal looks really good as does their menu.
My favorite breakfast place in downtown Brooklyn ,love the pancakes and crepes Definitely will be back for dinner too.

I had a great time at Verde with my fiancé about 3 months ago. I had a pasta with seafood and my fiancé a steak. The next day I had food poisoning and went to emergency room almost dying. I’m writing now because I saw that other person had the same problem. They should take more care of the freshness of the food they serve.
it is a warm place, good food, good attention
Fun place to eat with good food
Nice Italian restaurant
Went there with a party of 7. Service was great. Drinks kept coming. Food was amazing. I will definitely be going again. Worth the money
Best Italian food I've had in a long time.   7 stars.
Great service, great food and the manager was very accommodating.
Great place for any occasion( they have cute back patio winterized) Definitely you must try bronzino 🐟, portabello pasta and tiramisu. Great selection of wines. Service outstanding! Always fresh
Enjoyed brunch here, plenty of vegetarian options. Didn't feel rushed

The servers and hosts are very attentive, nice, and will READILY fill up your bottomless brunch drinks! The food is also priced really well for New York and it’s close to the Brooklyn Bridge for tourists who are looking at optimize their time! I will definitely come back!
great place for brunch - food is delicious and waitress / waiters services are awesome

Had a lovely private group dinner with family for a baby sprinkle surprise yesterday. The food, staff and atmosphere were all amazing. The staff were all so accommodating and food portions were plentiful and delicious. I would definitely plan another event there.
Amazing place. Great food. Great service.  Very nice vibe. Owners are always there. Very pleasant .  Must visit place. Will not be dissapointed . Cant wait to go back. Thank You Mark.
It’s very hard to find a place in NY to feel you are really welcome,thank you so much Verde on Smith for amazing dinner and unforgettable experience with unique cocktails.
Good food
Food was great
Excellent food. Everything was fresh and service was great. Wished I could of had the whole menu
Its the best place food exceptional

Bottomless brunch, amazing service and great food. Our bellinis were repeatedly filled without having to ask and when my steak was overcooked they promptly brought me a new one. The staff was really attentive and I will definitely be back!
Fantastic authentic Italian cuisine and friendly service!
Amazing place to have breakfast, brunch or dinner, very delicious menu selection.
Worth to wait on the line, low price and big portion
Great food!!! And they're great on refilling the mimosas (which is for 2 hours!) Definitely going to come back
Great food and service

I made a reservation for this place for Sept. 15, for 13 people, and requested outside seating. I called a few days before to confirm the reservation and outdoor seating. 30 minutes before we arrive I get a text from the restaurant asking to confirm our reservation. As I was on the subway, I got the chance to answer FIVE MINUTES later. The manager then responded saying he had given our table to someone else. When we arrived at 2 for our scheduled reservation, the manager made us wait for thirty minutes. Then proceeded to sit us at a table not for 13 AND inside. I asked why we weren’t outside and why we had to wait thirty minutes and the manager responded with “you can wait another twenty minutes if you want to sit outside”. As someone who works as a server and has been a hostess, this treatment of customers with a large table and confirmed reservation was in all honesty BS. If it wasn’t my birthday I would have left and gone somewhere else. Not respecting our reservation and being rude because they messed up was absolutely appalling and I am shocked that that man is a legitimate manager. 0/10 do not recommend at all. I wish there was someone above a manager there to speak to because I was absolutely appalled.

The service at this place is unreal. Went for brunch and they asked us to leave within an hour and lied to us about how long we’d been there. When we spoke to the manager he couldn’t have cared less. Literally came up to our table and told us to “eat faster because they have a big party waiting.” And then hovered over us until we left.
Good restaurant
Its cool
Awesome brunch
Awesome place
Very cool brunch place. There’s a good 2 hr bottomless deal for weekdays. The food is okay. But I still had a great time there.

This is one of my favorite restaurants in New York; the food is amazing, the service is outstanding and it is beautiful inside and in the patio in the back. Would recommend Verde On Smith to anyone I know!
Very pleasant and friendly. Nice  atmosphere
Great wine selection and homemade pastas. They also have s great brunch!

I had a 1:30 reservation, and a few days before they had no problem moving it to a later time. Unlike some other bottomless brunch spots in the area, as long as you are seated by 4 you get the 2 hours of mimosas. The food was great and came out quickly. I accidentally unscrewed the pepper and it dumped an excessive amount onto my eggs. I said it was fine, but the waiter quickly brought me out new eggs anyways which was so nice. The drinks were all good. It is cheap champagne, but what else can you expect. I like that they offer other options such as screwdrivers and Bellini.  Would definitely recommend and go back. We also sat on the back patio which was a nice atmosphere.
The waiter gave us the best service. Food is great, good portions and price is definitely affordable.
Great place for dinner with friends.

I came for brunch for my birthday and it was great. The food is amazing and the customer service was exceptional. There was a waiting time since I had a large group but it was definitely worth the wait. I will be returning soon.
Definitely a wait. But the food is definitely worth it. The Nutella Crepes? I am dead. The Smoked Salmon Frittata? I can't even. Sooooo good.
Yerrrp!

The bottomless drinks and staff were great- but the food weren't.  The salmon wasn't fresh- the potatoes on the sides were hard. Then when I switch to avocado egg toast- the toast was mushy...was below the average-but edible.
The staff is very friendly and they provide you with the option to customize your meal, and they don't rush you to leave when it's not busy.
Great place , great pleasant staff, outstanding food I would recommend this restaurant anytime
I enjoy myself the owner was really good guy the food was good and naturally all the drinks
The happy hour here leaves you leaving really happy 😃
Great place.

Decent food, prices about average for the neighborhood. Nice patio out back although patio chairs not that comfortable, especially for a leisurely brunch. Service okay - could have used an occasional check in to refill water and coffee. Still, will likely go back but nothing to really rave about, but to be fair, I have only had one meal there thus far.
Great Brunch spot in Brooklyn
Excellent food and service! We were treated like VIPs!

We had brunch there on Sunday and it was awesome. We paid the extra 20 bucks for the unlimited mimosas and we were not disappointed.  The staff was very attentive and always brought over another glass when you were finished you never had to ask.
Food was so good
Great for brunch! The unlimited breakfast cocktails are great with a wider variety than most places and the food was good too!
Had a wonderful breakfast here with my friend

Have been going for years, the food quantity has declined over the years. Yesterday I went,  I order the same thing I always get “Lobster Feast”, the food took almost an hour to get to the table.  I had a few bites nothing tasted fresh. I now have food poisoning.
New management, new menu for the most part. A little pricey, but lots of delicious offerings! Hope to revisit soon. I recommend it!

Sat in the back outdoor seating area. Free wine or drinks on birthdays (advertised on open table description)— and applied to our meal. We had pappardelle portobello spaghetti carbonara pasta and it was delicious. Service was also very responsive and overall. Solid Italian joint in Cobble Hill
It is a nice place and the food is delicious... The only thing is the waiting time is a bit long 😣

We had truly excellent fish but unfortunately very bad pasta: a big clump of pasta all stuck together, raw in the middle, covered with minced meat, not ragout as indicated.  The service was very nice.  We'd love to go back but they need to improve on the pasta - the place is supposed to specialize in homemade pasta, after all.
Great food and service
Bottomless mimosa brunch! The crowd can get VERY loud, though.

Visited twice in 24hrs! First visit was lowkey as it was towards the end of happy hour. Staff was friendly, second visit bartender recognized us and everyone was inviting. The brunch menu was delicious, GO FOR THE BURGER. ORDER PEACH MIMOSA, bloody Marie's are s hit or miss
Great food and Great service
Amazing service and delicious food. They did not skimp on the bottomless beverages for brunch. And though it is open to the outside, the AC was still on.
Great place and very friendly! Highly recommend! Great service and very tasty food!
Super Friendly Service, Tasty Food

Definitely recommend! Came for a ladies' brunch on a Saturday. Service was on point. The menu offers a variety of dishes. This place is quite popular so aim to arrive early. The surrounding area is cute too. Some shops worth looking into.
Great place for family. Really good food , wine. Excellent service. Best Italian Restaurant in downtown Brooklyn

I found this place on google. I live in neighborhood. We went on Friday night, it was packed. They have very cute outdoor patio with nice colorful design. Service is amazing.The staff very polite and attentive. The menu is well designed and good price. I ordered Grilled Octopus which was very tender and tasty. My friend got Crispy Gnocchi . He was also satisfied with his dish. Our drinks were great as well, we both got Aperol Spirits ...  I heard that they do bottomless brunch everyday so I will definitely try their brunch ..

The sign of a good restaurant is that they can make a good meal no matter what time of the day it is. Went to there late night and the meal was just so so. We were the only ones in the restaurant at 10 o'clock at night. But the restaurant next door was packed!  That should have been a sign that I should have gone somewhere else. The wine was so so the food was so so you know how it is when you eat because you're hungry but after you're done you really want your money back because the meal was mediocre and all the hype around the place was really disappointing.   If you're visiting Brooklyn this is a place that you can skip.

Environment is very nice on back patio, service is ok and food is good value, but it took over an hour for the omelette and panini we ordered. The couple next to us walked out after waiting the hour and everybody else on the patio was also quite frustrated with the wait. We walked here to go to restaurant next door, cafe lulu c, but opted for Verde due to the half hour wait to be seated at lulu. Should probably have waited. I see other reviews here for verde are positive so maybe there was just a staffing problem today.

Absolutely awful service. Went for brunch and it took over an hour to get a simple avocado toast and eggs benedict. No water or drink refills during the wait. Watched multiple people who arrived after us get their food before us. Food was mediocre at best and check took about 20 minutes to get after finished. Will not be back!!!
The food is seasoned and prepared well.
Food is small portions, drinks are ok with no ice. Dessert is good..
Brunch options are great! Good variety, great drinks, friendly staff! Will def be back soon.

I absolutely loved this place because they have the best menu servicing to all of your taste buds and you know they are great when they are packed and full. My personal favorite on the menu are the raw clams.
Good Italian Food.
Love the food, waiters. The owner is very nice and attentive. One of my favorite places in Carrol Gardens.
Great food!

I was so excited visiting verde on smith for the first time. I should of know it was a mistake coming here once we got to the door we waited a good 10-15 min several employees seen us and passed us bit not one said someone will be with you. That was first strike. Once we got seated the waiter was very rude and just in a rush taking our order. I ordered 2 different beers and once the drinks came he placed my friend mimosa and a beer in front of my husband did not once say your beer is coming or any other thing to us. I waited a good 15 minutes and I finally just asked management because I could bot get the waiters attention. Finally I'm trying to explain is this a stella or  IPA beer and the man just cuts me off I could not finish explaining so I tell him can I just explain. He goes on and tells me again. There is no more Stella it finished okay so Is this a stella or IPA plus the waiter came to table placed beer but did not tell me here is such and such and we do not have the other beer would you like something else and he looked confused so he took glass and brought a IPA  still did not apologize for the confusion and miscommunication. The food for most part was good the koby burger eggs and steak chocolate chip pancakes mozzeral sticks and chicken fingers and fries but the steak and cheese panini was okay the bread was hard as a rock and the crab cake burger  was so soggy could not eat it. We tried getting the waiters attention but we couldn't by then we were annoyed so just ate around what we could. Not once did the waiter ask if everything was okay. Waiters in this place were just rude not friendly not inviting.
Best place for brunch!
partially over cooked lobster. amazing clams, shrimp and the properly cooked part of the lobster.  inattentive waitstaff.  I'd go again
It's cute.
Very good selection of pasta and especially fish - love the branzino

My review has less to do with the food (which was fine), than with the experience. A noon reservation for 5 made well on advance of Mother's Day was apparently derailed by the weather. Regardless of the fact that weather predictions all week indicated rain, the restaurant overbooked. The result; a completely unusable covered outdoor area and seating 30 minutes or more behind...with no place to wait except the cold, damp outdoor space.  Initially my party was told we couldn't be seated because they had no record of our reservation. After some fumbling, the host found it by phone number. At that point we were told a 20 minute wait, and please go outside in the rain because you're blocking the door. I made it clear (and was admittedly rude) that we needed to be seated as my daughter had 2 hours to get her bus back to college. Twenty minutes turned into 40, finally we were seated.  My daughter ended up having to change her bus reservation with an additional cost. Thanks for the mimosa and apology, but a phone call to let us know of the issue prior to arriving could gave averted the entire fiasco. Additionally, although time would not have allowed us to accept, the offer of dessert or coffee gratis would gave been appreciated as recognition of our invonvenience due to your error.  Pssst...Verde, in addition to the culinary industry, you're also in the service and hospitality industry. Go the extra step to service your patrons. If you feel you're too successful to take ownership of situations such as this, you won't be successful for very long.
Great Place for  Family Dinner. The menu is extensive and reasonable price. Great wine and cocktails list. Service and staff on point. Will be back

@verdeonsmith was great! Drinks: bottomless options are sweet- mimosas, bloody Mary's,  screw drivers & peach, raspberry and mango bellinis. Atmosphere: Dope, though I don't recall any music, the loud chatter & laugher coming from millennials & Brooklyn natives was enough to make the place feel super cozy. Food: Super tasty, there were about 40 different items on the menu. Ranging in unbelievable prices from less then $10-$25.  Pictured are the steak, eggs, mixed green salad and roasted potatoes. Also, pictured, branzino, mashed potatoes & mixed green salad. @chas_eatsbk
Service was great polite staff

Since I have been in New York  this cute Italian restaurant became my favorite walking place, amazing brunch and lunch and very special dinner with fabulous ambience, I would definitely recommend to everyone,will. here many many more times , chicken parmigiana shrimp scampi French toast and  pancakes and of course homemade crab cakes...
Very nice staff and the food was delicious. They have a nice calm terrasse at the back.

I never review restaurants but I couldn’t let this go. I can’t explain how taken advantage of I feel paying $18 for a meal at verde. While the chicken was fine.  the vegetable were RUBBER, obviously formerly frozen. Inedible. I ate the mashed potatoes—flakes mixed rehydrated in water— but only because I was hungry and they were inoffensive. My girlfriend felt equally disappointed by her $18 pasta but I didn’t eat it so I’ll leave it at that.  In short, I would have felt ripped off paying $8 for this meal. Charging $18 is offensive.  The staff are all very nice, though, and I had a perfectly nice glass of wine.
Great bunch, food is okay but love the unlimi6drink option!
Been there three times great service.The owner or manager that's always there is a great guy super cool.Food is 👍👍
Amazing pasta, bellinis are on point and the staff is super friendly. I will definitely be coming here again.
Amazing place, good drinks, good food, fast service
Great place for brunch. Great food and drinks I would recommend this place. FYI for the summer make sure you make a reservation as it tends to get really busy but worth the wait.
Great
Busy Saturday food took a loooong time...35-40 mins. I had a crab burger thing and it was very average
Delicious food and great service and decor!
Had a dinner in Verde on Smith. Delicious food, pleasant ambiance, nice service. Highly recommend!
Food, service and presentation was good. We had a birthday dinner for our friend and they played happy birthday through the speaker.
VERDA on Smith amazing place great food great ambiance atmosphere service is amazing second time here I just love it
Everytime I'm in Brooklyn I try to get to Verde on Smith. Great food, great atmosphere, and great service - Thanks Hector
Good food and friendly staff.
Very nice place.  We were in town for the weekend we ate lunch there on Saturday and enjoyed our meal so much we went for breakfast the following day.
Great food
Had reservations but still had to wait for a while Otherwise food was good.
The drinks and food was terrific

Food is delicious I was there first day of spring with my neice I had their primavera with homemade pasta to celebrate new season my neice had chicken with homemade spaghetti all we left on plate was the fork!
Bad customer service.

Lovely place, amazing service! Our waiter was extremely nice and polite, he took a great care of us. The food was excellent! We had backed claims, and as the main course we had seafood spaghetti and fettuccine alfredo with chicken.  It was very fresh, I could say by the seafood taste. The owner was welcoming. I will be back for sure. Thank you for the great evening

I stopped at Verde for happy hour and ended up having dinner which was delicious. The service was excellent. The bartender Bilo was friendly, attentive and very creative with crafting drinks. I will definitely be back.

Verde was the best find in the Brooklyn area. An amazing Italian/ Mediterranean restaurant located on Smith Street. I want to start first with their decor, upscale with that rustic feeling along with cozy and romantic lights. I really the brick wall, it is very BROOKLYN for me. The dining room looks very cleaned and organized I can tell management know how to run also I noticed they have A grade.it is always a good sign. Anyway let me talk about the service; the owners; Mark and Abi are great hosts, they welcome their guests by the door with a nice smile and welcoming attitude. They check every table frequently if they are ok and needed anything. We had the same treatment as well. The wait staffs are amazing, friendly and very polite. The service was fast (we had an early dinner) and the drinks came quickly. They have a wide selection of good wine from Italy, Spain, Chile, New Zealand, and California. I tried their Agave Margarita; it was the perfect balance of sweet and sour. They must have a good bartender because bar seats were full. (They have happy hour during weeknights)  The menu has a nice mix of options and priced well considering it is Brooklyn. Fresh bread and olives are brought out to settle you in; we were told that the olives and olive oil are imported from Italy.  I had the Straccetti with arugula. The meat was cooked perfectly ( ordered Medium) the cut was high quality it was super tender and still juicy. It was a very good idea to match tasty steak with fresh crunchy arugula and hard shaved parmesan cheese. I also ordered The French fries were amazing! Very crisp and seasoned perfectly.  My wife ordered a seafood linguini.  The pasta (found out that they have fresh homemade pasta) was a perfectly cooked, clearly timed correctly to add to the sauce. The seafood was also perfectly cooked for each item. It could have used a scallop or something but it was still awesome. For the desserts, we tried their homemade Crème Brule and Tiramisu. Both were so tasty.  The timing was just right, clearly, the kitchen isn't pushing food out just to move tickets and that they spent the time that it needed. Things we found out after speaking with Mark and Abi - Live Music ( Every Friday-Sunday Nights) - Happy Hour (  Weeknights ) - Their Famous Brunch (Bottomless Cocktails). We definitely will try. - Delivery – Take Out Service -Catering for Offices, Residential, Lunch Meetings  It is our new favorite place. Well organized.

I was pleased with everything! besides the salmon and cheese on the bread. I was expecting more with the salmon. The buffalo wings were so great, had a lot of sauce. Calamari was friend perfectly. The potatoes were seasoned great and toast was amazing. The eggs had mozzarella cheese which threw me off a little but it was still nice. Their bottomless drink menu is great too. The waiter was so nice and very very persistent on making sure we were satisfied. I would come here again and recommend it.

Went here for brunch.  The food was reasonably good:  the soup (chicken) and the crepes (beef) were both better than average, the steak-and-eggs were reported to be good as well. The service was friendly, but painfully slow and a bit discombobulated.
Awesome place, love the drinks! Food is very fresh and absolutely delicious. We will definitely be back soon, 100%!!! A+++++ all the way!

It’s my favorite restaurant in Brooklyn, beautiful ambiance, food is very delicious, great service, stuff is very friendly and professional.  Oysters are my favorite, seafood roll is so rich and tasty, great selection of desserts. Definitely highly recommend to visit.

Wonderful downtown Brooklyn restaurant with cozy atmosphere, friendly staff and delicious food! Perfect place for date night or to meet up with friends. Loved the food menu selection and the great specials. Will definitely be back!

I’ve been to Verde twice while in New York. Very good food and drinks. On this latest visit, we went for brunch and I had the french toast, a side of bacon, and a raspberry Bellini. My family loved this place and plan to eat here again when in NY. I would strongly suggest making a table reservation before going.
(Translated by Google) Great place for getogethers. pleasant staff.  (Original) Great place for getogethers . pleasant staff.
The seafood pasta and cucumber fizz were tasty. A tight squeeze due to a large party being seated before us but great service.
Brunch review: Only come here if you want good food, good service and to not be rushed. Brunch is a HELLUVA value. Yummmm....
Great place, very polite,  prompt service, made reservations for 25 people for my fiancé with no problem worked with us on a menu prefix. Will visit again.
Best bottomless brunch in Brooklyn! Nice atmosphere and friendly staff
Great happy hour special on drinks till closing.
We had fantastic dinner with my girlfriends.
Great brunch and patio !

The food was pretty good, and the service was quick and friendly. The place itself was a good size and they had a two-hour special for Bottomless mimosas. However, this resulted in the restaurant being almost unbearably loud.

Great place to go! Staff is very friendly and caring! Food is excellent, we had shrimp scampi and beef short ribs were amazing and of course a variety flavors of bellinis are great!!! I will definitely going back and not only one time!!:)
Simply Amazing!!! The staff was Great... the owner very welcoming....the bottomless mimosas are endless.... The food is divine!! What more can a girl ask for 💞

Visited Verde Restaurant for dinner. A very cozy place, nice and friendly ambiance. The menu is perfect - something for everyone, a lot to choose from and a great value for the price. I had Chicken Marsala - excellent from preparation to presentation! My friend enjoyed Napoli style branzino - yammi!!! Service was very accommodating too. Will be back definitely!
Branzino was fantastic! must go!
Chicken Marcella was EXCELLENT!!!
Amazing please this is my first time here with my friends we had very good time. The steak is one of the best i had in NYC and the staff are very nice. Will definitely come here many more times.
Great vibes, nice staff would definitely recommend and go again!

I didnt know what to expect but boy was I surprised. My friends and I ordered 7 dish on the menu lol yea we were in the mood to eat. We started with the hot chocolate which was so comforting like mamas hug. The french toast was awesome and I say this as a french toast extraordinaire ! Did I tell you about the mimosa very light and refreshing if your a lightweight like myself. Overall the food was great and I will be visiting in the future.. you should too😁
Atmosphere very welcoming and excellent service the food is amazing

Great place for a night cap. The bar tender was lovely and made a great cocktail. She also offered to make anything that wasn’t on the list. Food menu looked very enticing too. Would’ve definitely tried if had more time.
like the live music at the weekend
Verde is always an  excellent experience. Great food, great ambiance and great service!!
LOVED their chicken sandwich! It was so fresh.
Ok so this is one of the few places that has brunch on Friday! Unlimited Bellinis n Mimosas for 2hrs! Great menu and service!
Good service
Delicious dinner, lovely ambience - can even have a conversation without screaming and wonderful wait staff
Food was amazing. Service fell short, waiter kept forgetting stuff. Then he poured coffee into one of our water glasses.

My favorite brunch place in Brooklyn.  Its funny because there are quite a few places that sport long lones on the block that arent nearly as good as Verde.  Thats actually how we "discovered" it.  Hungry and not willing to wait at Café Luluc or Clover Club, we figured we'd give it a spin.  Never turned back.  I legit have cravings for their Steak and Eggs.  Eggs are always cooked to perfection and they actually make the steak to your preference.  Amazing hamburger as well.  Coffee is some of the best in town. (Ask for cream, they'll bring you cream, not the genitically modified Half and Half).  They have unlimited 2 hour drink specials (mimosas, belinis, Bloody Marie's) but I don't drink that much with brunch so I've never tried it. Dinner is exceptional as well.  Great Italian favorites.  My one...and I mean ONLY complaint is their syrup...its legit gross. It's sounds snobby but if I'm going to Verde and in the mood for pancakes, I'll bring my own maple syrup.

The food and staff were both great. The Bloody Marys weren't great. It is very, very loud, so if you're looking for a quiet brunch, probably should avoid. I would definitely go back for the food, but not at brunch...
Solid spot for brunch.  Drinks are flowing and the food is good.
Nice restaurant. The ambiance was nice and the food was ok. A bit overpriced.
Absolutely gorgeous. The food is great, nice place for brunch with outdoor seating
Unlimited mimosas for brunch are the best!

Stopped here randomly for our brunch and loved it. Great brunch and breakfast. Really loved the pancake, fritatta. Also this one is in great neighborhood with plenty of options nearby. Servers were nice too.
